Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #11# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Crater# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Megaton Hammer# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #an Ice Trap# can be found in #the Market#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Pouch of Silver Rupees for the Spirit Temple#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Climb North Chest
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Spirit Temple Sun Block)

GV (Waterfall).text: Please don't abandon this seed. Our world deserves saving!

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Pouch of Silver Rupees for the Bottom of the Well# and #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Bottom of the Well Basement)

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Shield#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #the Sun's Song# and #an Ice Trap#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Hookshot#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: What did Zelda suggest that Link do when diplomacy didn't work?^${12 39 C7}Triforce.
